tool_description: Encrypts/Decrypts given text by using the Caesar Cipher. Each letter shifts by 3 positions.
title: Caesar Cipher

api_list.name: Decrypt
api_list.description: Decrypts given text using Ceasar's cipher.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://caesar-cipher1.p.rapidapi.com/decrypt/{encryptedtext}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "caesar-cipher1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Encrypt
api_list.description: Encrypts given text by using Ceasar's cipher.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://caesar-cipher1.p.rapidapi.com/encrypt/{unencryptedtext}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "caesar-cipher1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
